leather-shirt.name: Leather Shirt
leather-shirt.description: Apparently, wearing hardened pieces of leather on your chest substantially increases yor resistance to a wide variety of weapons. Who would have guessed?

iron-chestpiece.name: Iron Chestpiece
iron-chestpiece.description: A piece of your standard iron attire. More specifically the piece for your chest.

lamellar-chestpiece.name: Lamellar Chestpiece
lamellar-chestpiece.description: Armor covered in small overlapping pieces of metal. Not the most comfortable of things.

linen-tunic.name: Linen Tunic
linen-tunic.description: Not as tasty as a Linen Tonic, but slightly more wearable.

obsidian-chestpiece.name: Obsidian Chestpiece
obsidian-chestpiece.description: Not the most comfortable of things, but it IS... Sharp..?

bedrock-chestplate.name: Bedrock Chestplate
bedrock-chestplate.description: Legends tell tales of a chestplate so powerful that no mortal man could damage it. This is not that chestplate.
